body:
Features and Enhancements

Miscellaneous enhancements
  • Competitive Dashboard Add state Abbreviation column to csv export when State is chosen as the Group by option.
  • Create a List Display Market Total and All Selected Networks on every Create a List report
    • Previously, Market Total displayed only when the user did not specify any networks in the report criteria.
  • Create a List Summary Results: Add Office Counts and Locations Per Provider columns
    • Office Counts = number of unique offices
    • Locations Per Provider = Provider Locations / Unique Providers
  • Look Up a Provider Add Confirmed Practicing indicators to Look Up a Provider search results
  • Release Notes Collapse and Expand Release Notes
